title: Chatify
description: Personal Chat Room or Workspace to share resources and hangout with friends

body.raw:
> ## Short Explanation Chatify is a simple application for groups chat. You can invite your friends to join or create a new group chat and others people can join. You can login by google accout by one click sign in.
Techs used: Reactjs, Redux, Material ui
> ## Features
  • Easy SignIn with Google
  • Create Rooms
  • Realtime group messaging with image sharing
  • Supports Emoji
  • Reaction on messages - Delete message
> ## Lessons Learned Practice using and familiarizing yourself with the firebase database. Improve your real-time processing skills with live chat
